00029                                              :CurlSubmitForm(){

00033   this->filename=g.getAdminAdress("deleteserver.php");

00076 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlServerDelete::controlBefore(){
00077   bool ret=true;
00078 
00079   const char* name=postedData.getValue("name");
00080   const char* errmsg;
00081 
00082   // The name is empty
00083   if (strlen(name)==0){
00084     errmsg="The new server's name is empty";
00085     setCustomErrorMessage(errmsg);
00086     LOGW(errmsg);
00087     ret=false;
00088   }
00089 
00090   return ret;
00091 }
